info.name: Mint.com for 1920px screen
info.description:
A quick adaptation for 1920px screen (and more) to have a better readability on the Overview and Transaction pages.
Not perfect, but better than the original one in term of details readability.
info.additionalInfo:
Release notes:

v0.1 - 2020-01-02
- First draft on Overview page and transaction page
